attachments.title: Star Wars: The Force Accounted
attachments.text: Who is the Force strongest with? And how has the balance between light and dark shifted throughout the series? In anticipation of “The Force Awakens,” we decided to find out by watching every minute of the first two trilogies to identify, measure, and categorize use of the Force.
attachments.fallback: Bloomberg.com: Star Wars: The Force Accounted
